channel.title: Polypore dungeon
channel.description:
So i write my code, this is it.
[code] else if (object.getId() == 64361) //up player.useStairs(15456, new WorldTile(player.getX(), player.getY() + 1, player.getPlane() + 1), 3, 3); [/code]
If its upstairs, it will still do the old emote, but how do i set.
That when its upstairs (3,3 seconds later), another animation will start?
Thanks.

item.title: Polypore dungeon
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Create a timer for the emote to start as soon as you get to the top of the stairs, which in this case is 3 seconds after clicking the stairs.

Read full topic

item.title: Polypore dungeon
item.dc:creator: @The_Legendary_Leeche The Legendary Leecher
item.description:

So i write my code, this is it.

else if (object.getId() == 64361) //up player.useStairs(15456, new WorldTile(player.getX(), player.getY() + 1, player.getPlane() + 1), 3, 3);

If its upstairs, it will still do the old emote, but how do i set.

That when its upstairs (3,3 seconds later), another animation will start?

Thanks.
